mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile (tenantId, id, name, description, iconPath) VALUES (#{tenantid}, #{entity.id}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.iconPath})
mapper.select:
SELECT p.* FROM profile p, profilemember pm WHERE p.tenantId = #{tenantid} AND pm.tenantId = p.tenantId AND pm.profileId = p.id AND ( pm.userId = #{userId} OR pm.id IN ( SELECT pm.id FROM profilemember pm, (SELECT um.groupId, um.roleId FROM user_membership um WHERE um.tenantId = #{tenantid} AND um.userId = #{userId}) um WHERE pm.tenantId = p.tenantId AND ( (pm.groupId = um.groupId AND pm.roleId <= 0) OR (pm.roleId = um.roleId AND pm.groupId <= 0) OR (pm.groupId = um.groupId AND pm.roleId = um.roleId) ) ) ) GROUP BY pm.profileId
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
